question: Nitin Gadkari and this minister flagged off the 10th Slum Yuva Daud at Khichripur in New Delhi.
explanation: Sports Minister Vijay Goel and Road Transport and Highways Minister Nitin Gadkari flagged off the 10th Slum Yuva Daud at Khichripur in New Delhi. The Slum Yuva Daud is a part of the Adopt a Slum campaign of the Sports Ministry and Nehru Yuva Kendra Sangathan.
